short.ar: اختر من بين 1000+ اختصارت Google™ لتظهر كأزرار في نافذة منبثقة لتوفير المساحة
short.am,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,et,fil,gu,: Choose from 1000+ Google™ shortcuts to show up as buttons in a space-saving popup
short.ca: Trieu entre més de 1000 dreceres de Google™ per mostrar-les com botons en una finestra emergent que estalvia espai
short.da: Vælg mellem 1000+ Google™ genvejs-knapper i en pladsbesparene pop-up menu
short.de: Wähle aus mehr als 1000 Google™ Shortcuts, um sie dir als Buttons in einem platzsparenden Popup anzeigen zu lassen
short.el: Επιλέξτε πάνω από 1000+ συντομεύσεις Google ™ ως κουμπιά σε ένα αναδυόμενο παράθυρο που εξοικονομεί χώρο
short.es: Elija entre más de 1000 accesos directos de Google™ para mostrar como botones en una ventana emergente que ahorra espacio
short.es_419: Elija entre más de 1000 accesos directos a Google™ para mostrar como botones en una ventana emergente que ahorra espacio
short.fa: می‌توانید از یک پاپ‌آپ جمع و جور به ۱۰۰۰+ میان‌بر گوگل دسترسی داشته باشید و موارد مورد نظر خود را تبدیل به دکمه‌های دسترسی آسان کنید
short.fr: Choisissez parmi plus de 1000 raccourcis Google™ à afficher sous forme de boutons dans une fenêtre contextuelle peu encombrante
short.he: בחרו מתוך 1000+ קיצורים של Google שיופיעו ככפתורים בחלון מרחף וקומפקטי
short.hr: Izaberi između više od 1000 prečaca i posloži ih u skočni prozor kojim štediš prostor.
short.hu: Válasszon a több mint 1000+ Google™ parancsikon közül, amelyek gombként jelennek meg egy helytakarékos előugró ablakban
short.id,ms: Pilih dari 1000+ jalan pintas Google™ dan tampilkan sebagai tombol pada popup penghemat tempat
short.it: Per risparmiare spazio scegli tra oltre 1000 tasti di scelta rapida Google™ da visualizzare come pulsanti in un popup
short.ja: 1000以上あるGoogle™ショートカットをつかって、スマートなポップアップボタンが作成可能
short.nl: Kies uit 1000+ Google snelkoppelingen, die als knoppen verschijnen in een weining ruimte innemende pop-up
short.no: Velg mellom 1000+ Google™-snarveier til å vises som knapper i en plassbesparende popup
short.pl: Wybierz spośród ponad 1000 skrótów Google™, aby wyświetlać je jako przyciski w wyskakującym okienku
short.pt_BR: Escolha entre mais de 1000 atalhos da Google™ para exibir como botões em um pop-up salvador de espaço.
short.pt_PT: Escolha entre mais de 1000 atalhos da Google™ para mostrar botões num pop-up de tamanho reduzido
short.ru: Выберите из более тысячи ярлыков сервисов Google™ для отображения в виде кнопок во всплывающем окне
short.sr: Изаберите неку од 1000+ пречица за Google™ да бисте се приказали као дугмад у скочном прозору који штеди простор
short.sv: Välj från 1000+ Google snabblänkar att visas som knappar på en utrymmes-sparande popup
short.th: เลือก Shortcut สู่แอพของ Google ได้มากกว่า 1000 แอพ ด้วย icon เพียง icon เท่านั้น
short.tr: 1000'i aşkın Google servisi ve uygulaması arasından dilediğinizi seçin ve eklenti kutucuğu üzerinden favori Google servislerinize…
short.uk: Обирайте з 1000+ ярликів Google™, які відображатимуться як кнопки у випадаючому вікні
short.vi: Lựa chọn từ hơn 1000+ lối tắt Google để hiển thị bằng biểu tượng trong các cửa sổ nhỏ tiết kiệm không gian
short.zh_CN: 从 1000 多款 Google 应用中选出一些作为快捷方式按钮，在节省空间的小窗口里显示
short.zh_TW: 讓您從超過 1000 種的 Google 服務中自由選擇，並將這些服務的捷徑放在節省空間的彈出視窗中以按鈕方法顯示

long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,et,fa,fi,fil,gu,hi,:
Display all Google™ services as buttons in a space-saving popup next to your address bar. Reach services like Gmail, Google Reader, Google Maps, Google Calendar, and many more in just two clicks from your browser. The extension includes nearly 300 Google services and websites.

 Support
===================================
Please report bugs and requests using the following link and not the comments:
  https://chrome.google.com/webstore/support/baohinapilmkigilbbbcccncoljkdpnd

 
 Main features
===================================

 ✓ Nearly 300 Google™ shortcuts, continuously updated
 ✓ Buttons can be sorted and rearranged according to your needs
     (take a look at the screenshots)
 ✓ Support for 3 different icon sizes (16, 32, and 64px)
 ✓ Support for Google Apps™ specific URLs for your own domain
 ✓ Add your own custom URL button like a link to Facebook
 ✓ Change URLs of services
 ✓ Change names of services
 ✓ Integration of GMail this!, Map this!, Bookmark this!, etc.
 ✓ Integrated interface for goo.gl URL shortener


 Disclaimer
===================================

The developer of this extension is not affiliated in any way with Google Inc.
All Google icons and names are a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
Notice: All referenced brands, product names, service names and trademarks are property of their respective owner(s).


 Misc
===================================

The extension is free at the moment, you can buy me a coffee here:
 http://goo.gl/8cuKn

The extension needs access to all of your websites to use the "GMail this" feature, that copies a selected text into a new mail.

The extension needs access to all of your websites to use the "GMail this" feature, that copies a selected text into a new mail.

changelog:

 Latest changes in version 2.0.x
===================================
version 2.0.1.x
---------------
* The landing page with ads that appeared when the app was being installed or updated, is now removed.
* Added Google keep
* updated icons for cloudprint, artproject and webfonts

version 2.0.0.x
---------------
Extension has a new owner/developer now: Carlos Jeurissen.
* Redesigned settings page
* Updated extension to manifest v2.0
  - all javascript is now in an external javascript page
  - replaced all event attributes with event listeners
  - some more changes
* added some new services
  - advanced search
  - google cars
  - google scripts
  - api explorer
  - api console
  - tag manager
  - google+ pages
  - google+ communites
* removed some services (google spring cleaning)
* renamed some services
  - "Mail" to "Gmail"
  - "Plus" to "Google+"
  - "Docs - new presentation" to "slides" (same for all the other docs services)
  - "goo.gl" to "url shortener"
  - "settings" to "google settings"
  - "product search" to "shopping"
* updated a lot service icons, including:
  - google+ icons (thanks to +m)
  - drive icons
  - appengine (thanks to +m)
  - support forum
  - dashboard
  - android developer console
  - moderator
  - product ideas
  - public data explorer
  - green
  - drive
  - apps and apps dashboard
  - playstore, play magazine
  - contacts
  - google settings
  - news archive
  - web history
  - currency converter
  - art project
  - panoramio
  - hotelfinder

 Latest changes in version 1.6.4.x
===================================

v1.6.4.2 - 2012-06-30
+ added Play - Magazines, Plus - Events, Earth engine, Coordinates
* some new icons

v1.6.4.0 - 2012-06-06
+ added Green, Elections
* renamed Accounts -> Settings, New -> About
* Goo.gl is working again
long.en,en_AU:
Display all Google™ services as buttons in a space-saving popup next to your address bar. Reach services like Gmail, Google Drive, Google Keep, Google Maps, Google Calendar, and many more in just two clicks from your browser. The extension includes more than 1000 Google services and websites.
 
 Main features
===================================

 ✓ More than 1000 Google™ shortcuts, continuously updated
 ✓ shortcuts can be sorted and rearranged according to your needs
     (take a look at the screenshots)
 ✓ Support for 3 different icon sizes (16, 32, and 64px)
 ✓ Add your own custom URL button like a link to Facebook
 ✓ Change names of services
 ✓ Integration of GMail this!, Map this!, Bookmark this!, etc.

 Support
===================================
Please report bugs and requests using the following link and not the comments:
  https://apps.jeurissen.co/shortcuts-for-google/contact


 Disclaimer
===================================

The developer of this extension is not affiliated in any way with Google Inc.
All Google icons and names are a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
Notice: All referenced brands, product names, service names and trademarks are property of their respective owner(s).


 Misc
===================================

The extension is free at the moment, you can buy me a coffee here:
https://apps.jeurissen.co/shortcuts-for-google/donate

The extension needs access to all of your websites to use the "GMail this" feature, that copies a selected text into a new mail.
